text.name: sys_description
text.text: This arcade emulator originally started as Final Burn, initially created by Dave in 2000. It was then forked as Final Burn Alpha by TrebbleWinner in 2004, and somewhat recently in 2019 it was forked once again as Final Burn Neo. It has become one of the best arcade emulators available, thanks to Lantus and IQ_132 for their various optimizations. It is updated very often and emulates different systems such as MVS, CPS1, CPS2, System 16, System 18, Sega's X and Y Board and the multitude of boards by Cave Toaplan, Taito, Psikyo and Kaneko. Just like MAME it offers graphical shaders, savestates, etc.
